byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and BRIAN STELTER

abstract: Time Warner's Warner Brothers Television Group and the CBS Corporation have reached a four-year deal with Netflix, giving it the rights to stream shows from the CW network.
snippet: Time Warner's Warner Brothers Television Group and the CBS Corporation have reached a four-year deal with Netflix, giving it the rights to stream shows from the CW network.
lead_paragraph: 2:01 p.m. | Updated Once a Netflix skeptic, Time Warner has struck its biggest deal yet to allow the online service to license its television content.

headline.main: Deal With Time Warner Brings the CW to Netflix
